name: serve
description: Builds and serves your app, rebuilding on file changes.

options.name: project
options.description: The name of the project to build. Can be an app or a library.

options.name: configuration
options.description:
A named build target, as specified in the "configurations" section of angular.json.
Each named target is accompanied by a configuration of option defaults for that target.
Setting this explicitly overrides the "--prod" flag

options.name: prod
options.description:
Shorthand for "--configuration=production".
When true, sets the build configuration to the production target.
By default, the production target is set up in the workspace configuration such that all builds make use of bundling, limited tree-shaking, and also limited dead code elimination.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: buildEventLog
options.description: **EXPERIMENTAL** Output file path for Build Event Protocol events

options.name: watch
options.description: Rebuild on change.

options.name: browserTarget
options.description: Target to serve.

options.name: host
options.description: Host to listen on.

options.name: proxyConfig
options.description: Proxy configuration file.

options.name: ssl
options.description: Serve using HTTPS.

options.name: sslKey
options.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

options.name: sslCert
options.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

options.name: open
options.description: Opens the url in default browser.

options.name: verbose
options.description: Adds more details to output logging.

options.name: liveReload
options.description: Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

options.name: publicHost
options.description: Specify the URL that the browser client will use.

options.name: servePath
options.description: The pathname where the app will be served.

options.name: disableHostCheck
options.description: Don't verify connected clients are part of allowed hosts.

options.name: hmr
options.description: Enable hot module replacement.

options.name: port
options.description: Port to listen on.

options.name: hmrWarning
options.description: Show a warning when the --hmr option is enabled.

options.name: servePathDefaultWarning
options.description: Show a warning when deploy-url/base-href use unsupported serve path values.

options.name: optimization
options.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

options.name: aot
options.description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

options.name: sourceMap
options.description: Output sourcemaps.

options.name: vendorSourceMap
options.description: Resolve vendor packages sourcemaps.

options.name: evalSourceMap
options.description: Output in-file eval sourcemaps.

options.name: vendorChunk
options.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

options.name: commonChunk
options.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

options.name: baseHref
options.description: Base url for the application being built.

options.name: deployUrl
options.description: URL where files will be deployed.

options.name: progress
options.description: Log progress to the console while building.

options.name: poll
options.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.
